properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.* FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER ) M
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT b.*, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_name FROM Board b JOIN Member m ON b.member_no = m.member_no
SELECT R.* FROM REPORT_DETAIL R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , B.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo , M.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName , M.MEMBER_ALIAS AS memberAlias , B.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle , B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent , B.BOARD_COUNT AS boardCount , B.BOARD_ENROLL_DATE AS boardEnrollDate , B.BOARD_CATEGORY AS boardCategory , B.BOARD_STATUS AS boardStatus , R.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo , R.REPORT_NO AS reportNo , R.REPORT_MEMBER_NO AS reportMemberNo , R.REPORT_DATE AS reportDate FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN REPORT_DETAIL R ON (B.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO)
UPDATE Board SET Board_STATUS = 'N' WHERE Board_NO IN (?)
UPDATE Board SET Board_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE Board_NO IN (?)
